predicate.note: Frames file for 'weave' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to interlace as if by weaving

example.name: passive
example.text: So glasnost is not [a value]-1 woven [*]-1 with steel threads into the fabric of Russian society .
example.arg: into the fabric of Russian society

roleset.name: to move in a circular course

example.name: participle
example.text: [A couple in fashionable spandex warm-up suits]-2 jogs by , headphones jauntily in place , [*-2] weaving their way along a street of fractured and fallen houses .
example.arg: along a street of fractured and fallen houses
